name: WORLD GENERATOR 1.0
description:
WORLD GENERATOR 1.0

This is a program that generates random worlds based on an algorithm made by https://grelf.itch.io/forest.

CONTROLS:
WASD = move horizontally
Q & E = move vertically
mouse = look around

Every time you reload the game page a new world will be created!

This will be a bigger open world game that will be playable in browser with little to no load time. Follow my journey!! https://twitter.com/festivalbreakin

(Keep in mind that the world is divided into "chunks", and only the 9 closest chunks are drawn on the screen at the same time. This should look okay when you're on the ground, but as you travel up in the sky you will see the world's "limit" more clearly.)
